pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
- regarding the second bullet point - yes, when users insert a simple shape from the top half of the Insert tab they are inserted as links whereas models inserted from the list of models (bottom half) are models (assembly of links).

Screenshot:

![model_editor_insert.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/288092102-model_editor_insert.png)
content.html:
• regarding the second bullet point - yes, when users insert a simple shape from the top half of the Insert tab they are inserted as links whereas models inserted from the list of models (bottom half) are models (assembly of links).
